{{ ello }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { number = Array(8).fill(0).map((x,i)=>i); ello = true; checkbox(ello: boolean): void { this.ello = !ello } }
